column4: Will the Ubuntu 9.04 clear my home directory of unneeded files OR are the only two options 1. to remove it all(with backup) or 2. to keep it all ?
what do you mean by removing unnneeded files?
for instance , the gimp2.2 , gimp2.3 directories , keeping gimp2.6 directory...
no, unless you use the --purge option when uninstalling it won't touch those files
